message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its high value and quality, I am offering it to you for $9500. This price reflects the product's worth and ensures you receive an exceptional deal. I look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it if we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider your offer. In light of this, I am proposing to sell the product to you for $8200. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while still ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this revised price works for you.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $8000. I believe this is a fair price that works for both of us.
